item.description: import pandas as pd import numpy as np 读入数据 data = pd.read_csv("./datasets/50_Startups.csv") data.head() R&D Spend Administration Marketing Spend State Profit 0 165349.20 136897.80 471784.10 New York 192261.83 1 162597.70 151377.59 443898.53 California 191792.06 2 153441.51 101145.55 407934.54 Florida 191050.39 3 144372.41 118671.85 383199.62 New York 182901.99 4 142107.34 91391.77 366168.42 Florida 166187.94 分开xy X = data.iloc[:,:-1].values Y = data.iloc[:,-1].values 编码 from sklearn.preprocessing import
